duties_responsibilities.duty: Managing a patient panel with a broad array of patient needs, including acute, chronic, and well visits.
Treating patients in-office, in testing centers, and conducting occasional tele-health visits.
Continuous learning during weekly Clinical Rounds and through other modalities.
Collaborating with in-office teammates via daily huddles, as well as with virtual clinical teams.
Utilizing specific clinical training and opportunities to perform in-office procedures.
Supervising one or more NP or PA colleagues.

education_certification.credential: Enrolled in, or have completed, an accredited Family Medicine or Medicine/Pediatrics residency program.
Practiced at least 2 of the last 5 years in an outpatient primary care setting seeing all ages (0+).
Board certified in Family Medicine or Medicine/Pediatrics, or Board Eligible with plans to obtain board certification within 1 year of start date.
State licensed in California, obtained before start date.
